channel.title: Whonix 16.0.9.0 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
# Whonix for VirtualBox
Download Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox
----
This is a point release.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Point_Release
----
# Major Changes
* Tor `0.4.7.11` * Tor Browser `11.5.8` * Install Thunderbird by default * updated sdwdate onion sources (Thanks to @TNT_BOM_BOM!) * Work towards https://forums.whonix.org/t/change-default-shell-from-bash-to-zsh-by-default/14792 (Thanks to @nyxnor!) * add `onion-grater-list` (Thanks to @nyxnor!) * improved build script `--connection onion` support * Continuous Integration (CI) (Thanks to @Mycobee!) * whonix-welcome-page: add 2022 end of year donation campaign banner * KVM: remove dependency on xserver-xorg-video-qxl https://forums.whonix.org/t/help-welcome-kvm-development-staying-the-course/166/501 * fixed rare minor issue https://forums.whonix.org/t/security-misc-pam-info-broken-pipe-bug/15951 * pam-info (notify about how many remaining login attempts): now also working in xscreensaver
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Contribute
----
# Changelog
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Stable_Release
----
# Full difference of all changes
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.8.2-developers-only...16.0.9.0-developers-only

item.title: Whonix 16.0.9.0 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix for VirtualBox

Download Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix – 28 Oct 22

Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Stable Version

This is a point release.

Kicksecure – 13 Aug 22

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

Major Changes

  • Tor 0.4.7.11
  • Tor Browser 11.5.8
  • Install Thunderbird by default
  • updated sdwdate onion sources (Thanks to @TNT_BOM_BOM!)
  • Work towards Change default shell from bash to zsh by default? (Thanks to @nyxnor!)
  • add onion-grater-list (Thanks to @nyxnor!)
  • improved build script --connection onion support
  • Continuous Integration (CI) (Thanks to @Mycobee!)
  • whonix-welcome-page: add 2022 end of year donation campaign banner
  • KVM: remove dependency on xserver-xorg-video-qxl [Help Welcome] KVM Development - staying the course - #501 by HulaHoop
  • fixed rare minor issue security-misc pam-info broken pipe bug
  • pam-info (notify about how many remaining login attempts): now also working in xscreensaver

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix – 24 Nov 22

Donating to Whonix ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Whonix – 27 Nov 22

Ways to Contribute

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Changelog

Whonix – 28 Nov 22

Stable Release

Whonix ™ Release Notes, Changelog, Whonix ™ 16 Stable Release

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/16.0.8.2-developers-only...16.0.9.0-developers-only
